title: Ability of megadoses of vitamin C to destroy vitamin B12 and cobinamide and to reduce absorption of vitamin B12 (with a note on B12 radioassays)
author: V Herbert; L Landau; R Bash; S Grosberg; N Colman
description: Ability of megadoses of vitamin C to destroy vitamin B12 and cobinamide and to reduce absorption of vitamin B12 (with a note on B12 radioassays) was published in Vitamin B12 on page 1069.
